text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Not being able to clinch it at the crucial moment is just like me... but it's frustrating.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh... such positive words! I did give it my best shot. No regrets there!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll train hard, pat-pat, so I can properly get first place next time!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course! I'm not satisfied with a placing like this either!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Next time, I'll show you I can get first place! Wait for me, everyone cheering me on!
